name: A Simple Date
description:
Cutie, Joy, and edge are three girls that you've had your eye on for a while. To night is the night, you're going to take one of them on a date!  Tell them what they want to hear and maybe things will go your way!

This short dating sim was made as practice for something bigger. It has:

Music!
Three endings!
Cute girls!
Cussing! (No babies allowed!)

music from: incompetech.com

IMPORTANT!
This game requires you to have a thick skin! If you are easily offended I do not recommend playing. Please remember this is all in good fun!
